name: Oyster Sausages
description: The sausages were often served for breakfast with scrambled eggs.
keywords: appetizer, main course, beef suet, bread crumbs, oyster, nut-free, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients but butter and oil and mix well. Using sausage stuffer, stuff into casing, making each sausage about 5 inches long. Twist and tie.
Prick with fork and poach in salted water 10 to 15 minutes, until firm. To serve, brown quickly on both sides in butter and oil.
